sources.description:
The unhistorical adventures of the cutthroat pirate William Kidd, who captures Admiral Blayneâ€™s treasure ship and hides the bounty in a cave.  This film was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Original Score at the 18th Academy Awards

This movie has German, Portuguese & Spanish dubbed audio tracks, and many subtitles
